extendedInfo.description: "FFBLife Fantasy Football Expert" is a fantasy football advice application with much more. With this application you can ask FFBLife experts specific questions about your fantasy football team and receive personalized answers in return. This includes draft, start/sit, trade questions and more. Also this app has the latest fantasy news from various sites, forum and messaging capabilities and much more. Our site www.ffblife.com has the goal of being the one-stop-shop for fantasy football players everywhere and we're hoping this app will eventually become a large part on us accomplishing that goal. See all features inside.

reviews.title: Sweet!
reviews.comment: All i need for the upcoming season in ONE APP!!
reviews.author: valentino ganacias
